F2

See the log in bug 19238.

Upon noticing the flashing (see bug 19238), I probably reset the perspective to 
see if it would fix the problem.  This message may be the result of everything 
already being out of whack.  I do know that when I shutdown and then reran 
eclipse I got an error about the perspective being in an invalid state (or 
something like that) and then I defaulted back into the default perspective 
rather than our custom perspective.

Fixed for build >20020610 and verified by Simon Arsenault. Bug 19797 logged to 
review this code in a later release for possible deletion.
Verified by Adam S in F3.
